title: Day 1 - Tales From the Gas Station Part 1
itunes:title: Day 1 - Tales From the Gas Station Part 1
itunes:subtitle: 31 Days of Horror 2018
description:
There's a gas station at the edge of town...

***

Written by Gas Station Jack

***

Subscribe to My Neighbors Are Dead at https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/my-neighbors-are-dead/id1223768363?mt=2

Please consider supporting the podcast at Patreon.com/Creepypod or creepypod.com/support
